workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.2594203697340638 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.4908448038997076 --weight-decay 0.0007271436902737347 --lr 0.0009586640123273165 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 44732 --max-lr 0.0007259980325384816 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.9212348499839542 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.056248053418184174 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
